targets.rawSql:
SELECT signal_strength
FROM system_status
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT alert_queue
FROM system_status
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT resource_type, status, eta
FROM resources;

SELECT date, alert_type, alert_count
FROM analytics;

SELECT timestamp, message, responder_name, status
FROM communications;

SELECT alert_id, alert_time, signal_type, severity_level, sender_name, verification_status
FROM sigalert;
